website_summaries.verdict: A richly colored leather blotter with class to spare that stays firmly in place regardless of desk’s surface material.
pros: A quality pad that protects the desk underneath thanks to its felt bottom, it lays flat and provides a smooth surface for writing
Side rails have room to store business cards
Costs less than other comparable leather blotters
cons: Some users report that pen can go through paper if writing too firmly on the pad's surface

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Hubby LOVES this. Well constructed and does an excellent job of giving him a writing surface. Padding on the back keeps the desk from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Bekka's Kindle Reviews

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICELY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, I must say that it is well made and that the only complaint I have is that it does not have a ledge on the front side of it so that it may remain on the very edge of my desk. Still it does not slide easily but non the less, because of this, I give 4 stars. P.S. I still would recommend this product to anyone who would like to adorn their desk at home or work.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not so nice...
customer_reviews.text: Product appeared to be repackaged, once returned. Left side leather scratched down the length times 3 and crushed on lower left side. it would have been really nice, had I purchased it in person. The right side was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: quality pad
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked if it also came with to tonal blotter insert to protect, but it is a great mat
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Have a beautiful Empire desk with some stains and scratches on the surface. Many $$$$ to refinish or this pad to cover it up for $. Much happier with the pad as it improves the overall look and functionality. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Creature

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Quality product as all the reviews indicate. came nicely packaged. Glad I decided to get the larger size. would highly recommend to any one in need of a desk pad.

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS IMPRESSIVE ON MY DESK

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad, to replace a similar but very old and worn-out blotter. It looks lovely on his desk and he is pleased with it. Perfect asset for home office or work desk.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Delivered with not a single mar. This is a quality desk pad, that performs well, but looks extremely rich and elegant. Brings out the beauty of my oak roll top.

customer_reviews.title: I needed something of quality and this desk pad is perfect. It has leather sides and you can purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I always used those cheap desk calendars for my office. There is no need to have a desk calendar if you have a computer. I needed something of quality and this desk pad is perfect. It has leather sides and you can purchase sheets of paper that will fit if needed. The desk pad is perfect for me and looks great. It ships in a flat box and it came fast. If you want to enhance your desk top, I would recommend this desk pad. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to protect my desk with plenty of room for writing and my mouse. I love i!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Why isn't it cut to size to fit the leather desk pad?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Company!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE... After posting this review I received a call from the president of Decasso within hours. He did everything anyone could hope to rectify the situation. Excellent service. Decasso has a customer for life! Original Posting: What a shame. Product arrived with poorly stained leather (water marks?) and dimples (dents) on both sides. I have purchased many products from this manufacturer in past with positive results. But the quality control in this instance is entirely unacceptable. Packaging was excellent, only problem is that someone packed a noticeably defective product! This was to be a gift for my son this weekend. Total let down.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Maher

customer_reviews.title: on small side
customer_reviews.text: While the desk pad is good looking, it is slightly too small to put a calendar in it unless the top of the calendar pad to is torn off.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Surface
customer_reviews.text: I have a very nice rosewood desk that I got in Japan over twenty years ago. This pad protects this desk and gives me a solid surface to work on. Great value.

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk pad
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk pad, it's beautiful and the leather is very nice quality. Writing on the felt is perfect. Since I keep a paper calendar on the desk pad I purchased heavy plastic at the fabric store for a shield to lay on top.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

The color is exactly as I expected and the quality is outstanding.

product_meta.title: Dacasso Mocha Leather 25.5" x 17.25" Side Rails Desk Pad
product_meta.description: This 25. 5-inch by 17. 25-inch desk pad features genuine top-grain leather with a matching felt bottom. The perfect way to keep your desktop protected, organized, and beautifully decorated! Functional side-rails allow the use of blotter paper.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
